summary: A group of teenagers fear for their lives in the swamps of Louisiana, chased by Mr. Jangles, a man possessed by 13 evil souls, and now relentless in his pursuit of new victims.
cast: Agnes Bruckner|Jonathan Jackson|Laura Ramsey|D.J. Cotrona|Rick Cramer|Meagan Good|Bijou Phillips|Method Man|Pawel Szajda|Davetta Sherwood|Stacey Travis|Marcus Lyle Brown|James Pickens Jr.|Deborah Duke|Michael James Dukes|David Michel
title: Envenenados
